Title: The AGASSIZ project
Body: Date: Wed, 20 Nov 1996 20:02:29 GMT Server: Apache/1.1b3 Content-type: text/html The AGASSIZ project The primary goals of the Agassiz project are to study the architectural, compiler and machine organizational issues for high-performance computer systems, including both uniprocessors and multiprocessors, that exploit medium-grained and fine-grained parallelism.
